Indonesian Equities Mutual Funds and Balanced Mutual Funds can be found under ID Equities. Global Indices can be found under US Equities. Importance of Diversification Across Asset Classes If you’ve ever heard the expression “Don’t put all your eggs in one basket”, that’s referring to the concept of diversification. In investing, diversifying means investing in some assets that should go up, when other assets go down. For instance, during the global financial crisis, gold rallied as equity prices dropped as investors fled to ‘safe haven’ assets. If you had invested in gold as well as stocks, your portfolio would have fallen much less than if it only contained equities. How to “diversify right” in Pluang Learn the 4 Key Investment Concepts! Why do I have to do the verification process? Is my data going to be safe? Why is the verification process for some products different? Pluang strives to make it easy for you to access the best products, but some products are regulated by different parties. Mutual funds are regulated by OJK, while gold and US stocks are regulated by BAPPEBTI. Therefore, some products require a different verification process to comply with applicable regulations and ensure your account remains safe. Your data will only be used for the verification process with third parties. Pluang has collaborated with registered parties and is supervised by regulators (BAPPEBTI and OJK) to ensure that your data is safe. Verification is needed to ensure that your identity is correct and valid according to applicable regulations. Verification is also required to ensure your experience using Pluang is easy and safe from crime or theft.
